INTERTALK is an innovative online English teaching institute. We deliver top quality language training programs to students in China through our unique offering of creative education ethics. With full market coverage in China, INTERTALK serves clients from 100+ cities across the nation. Sincerity, inspiration and innovation form our people-centered company culture.Our vision is to breakthrough repetitive traditional teaching modules by introducing notion of diversity and initiative into our advanced teaching methodology to take the leadership in this rising industry.
English Teachers
Requirements

Excellent English speaker with American or neutral accent

Energetic, passionate and cheerful in teaching kids

Great interpersonal skills and strong work ethics

Computer literate

Available to work full-time and open to work during weekends

Responsibilities

Delivering online tutoring session to students age between 4~15

Creating a positive, interactive and supportive online environment

Completing learning goals of each lesson and progress to a higher level

Providing constructive feedback to students for further improvement

Receptionist
Requirements

Excellent verbal and written English

Candidate must be able to communicate effectively

Previous experience is preferred, but not mandatory. Fresh graduates are welcomed

PC proficient

Well-organized, high attention to detail

Multi-tasking skills are required

Positive work attitude and can work under pressure

Responsibilities

Manning the front desk of the company

Greeting and accommodating visitors and guests

Answering and routing phone calls

Assisting administration routines

Scheduling training sessions and conferences

Completing other assigned office duties

Scheduler
Requirements

Excellent verbal and written English

Attention to details, multi-tasking capacity

PC proficient

Well-organized and deadline-driven

Ability to coordinate and plan class schedule

Strong communication skills and problem-solving ability

Responsibilities

Assembling and coordinating students’ information

Developing accurate workload forecast

Inputting teachers’ shift schedule into the system

Coordinating with teachers for real-time management of scheduled shifts

Reporting performance and attendance information to the management team

Determine proper workload distribution for class schedule planning purpose

HR Specialist
Requirements

Excellent verbal and written English

Experience in handling labor cases

High analytical skills and excellent in managing conflicts

The capacity to plan, implement and manage corporate wide affairs

Ability to sustain a positive work environment to improve employee-employer relationship

Responsibilities

Sourcing qualified potential applicants through online platform and social media

Overseeing hiring process including coordinating job posts, reviewing resumes and performing reference checks

Preparing or updating employment records related to hiring, transferring, promoting and terminating

Explaining human resource policies, procedures, laws and standards to new and existing employees

Ensuring new hire paperwork is completed and processed

Informing job applicants of duties, responsibilities and work conditions

Completing other assigned duties

Accountant
Requirements

Candidate must possess a College Degree in Accountancy and a CPA Board Passer

Required skills: Bookkeeping, Taxation details, FS Analysis

Proficient in English

Responsibilities

Responsible for the timely preparation and submission of the Financial Statement

Ensuring the accuracy of the financial statement submitted to the management & BOD

Reporting activities that are detrimental to the interest of the company

Responsible for the first line audit of authenticity, correctness and validity of all accounting transactions, documents and records to safeguard the company’s properties, interest and integrity

Technician
Requirements

Fluent English speaker

At least 3 years’ experience in system maintenance

Advanced knowledge of network security protection, Internet/ Intranet platform construction, including firewall, encryption, proxy techniques, and network monitoring software

Excellent communication skills and team-working ability

Experience in administering a network of more than 100 users

Responsibilities

Managing the Internet infrastructure

Administering various computer networks, servers and applications

Troubleshooting computing systems to identify malfunctions

Checking virus regularly to maintain the intranet security

Trainer
Requirements

Excellent verbal and written English

Previous experience in English teaching

Understand how to create a fascinating class by using body language, voice acting, and amiable personalities

Able to present teaching skills to INTERTALK teachers

PC proficient

Responsibilities

Evaluating teachers’ performance regularly

Responsible in coaching trainees in alignment to our needs

Identifying teachers’ teaching flaws and conduct specific training towards teachers

Developing, maintaining and improving training program modules, manuals and lesson plan

Supervising INTERTALK teachers and improving their performances to reach our requirements
